page.title: 11Playground Games
page.content: {Cups and Saucers} This is a game which needs a ball and any number of people.One player throws the ball to the another.If they miss the ball they have to go down on one one knee.They then pass it on.Then if the person who had missed the first time and caught it the second time, that person stands up again.If not the person goes down on one knee,then two knees, then uses one hand to catch and then lies down.After that you are out. The game goes on until there is only one person left,and that person is the winner.
